detail_desc: Padded bootees in patterned wind- and water-repellent functional fabric with elastication at the heels and a hook and loop tab on the shaft. Reflective details. Soft soles. Thinsulate™ lining.
Ankle-length trousers in woven fabric with a fake fly and regular waist with a decorative drawstring and elastication at the back. Side pockets and tapered legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Ankle-length trousers in woven fabric with a high paper bag waist that is elasticated at the back, a detachable tie belt, side pockets and gently tapered legs.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist and wide sides.
Jacket in washed, hard-worn denim with a hood and sleeves in sweatshirt fabric. Drawstring hood, buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button and ribbed cuffs.
Trousers in soft sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Cropped top in soft sweatshirt fabric with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a wrapover, jersey-lined hood with a decorative drawstring, dropped shoulders, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Elasticated satin scrunchies.
Sleeveless dress in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Dungarees in cotton corduroy with adjustable straps that fasten at the front, a detachable belt at the waist, zip fly and side pockets.
Sleeveless dress in printed jersey with a slightly lower neckline at the back, seam at the waist and flared skirt.

Push-up bras in microfibre with mesh details and underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Vest tops in ribbed cotton jersey with a visible elastic trim at the top, decorative buttons at the front and narrow, adjustable elastic shoulder straps.
Leather ballet pumps with grained sections in a contrasting colour, elastic straps over the foot and a bow at the back. Leather linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Top in soft jersey with a round neckline, long sleeves, and gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy.
Tube scarf in soft faux fur.
Knee-length dress in a light jacquard weave with a V-neck, collar and ties at the front. Dropped shoulders, narrow cuffs and a round hem. Unlined.
Long-sleeved hoodie in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Jumper in a soft knit with a slightly wider neckline and long sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Sleeveless jersey top in a soft viscose blend with studs around the neckline, deep armholes and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
5-pocket, ankle-length trousers in imitation leather with a high waist, zip fly and button and straight legs with seams just below the knees.

KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Set with a vest top and boxer shorts in soft, organic cotton jersey. Vest top with a picot trim around the neckline and armholes and a small bow at the front. Boxer shorts with a picot trim around the waist and hems, a small bow at the front and a lined gusset.
Straight-cut jacket in cotton denim with a collar and buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets with a button, front pockets and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
Fully lined bikini. Flounced top with narrow shoulder straps, one with a small metal decoration, and a plastic fastener at the back. Bottoms with a decorative bow at each side.
Trousers in sturdy organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and back pockets.
Triangle bikini top with lace trims, lined cups with removable inserts, narrow ties that fasten at the back of the neck and ties at the back.

Jacket in soft, thermal fleece that can be worn as a protective mid layer with a stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, and raglan sleeves. Rounded and slightly longer at the back. The jacket is made partly from recycled polyester.
Elasticated scrunchies in pleated satin.
Shorts in an airy viscose weave. High waist with wide elastication, and short, wide legs.
Straight-style T-shirt in lightweight sweatshirt fabric. Round neckline with a wide, ribbed trim, a visible seam down the back and short slits in the sides of the hem.

Hooded, partially-padded running jacket with sections in water-repellent functional fabric, sleeves in stretch jersey and reflective details. Zip down the front with a chin guard, a chest pocket with a taped zip, and long sleeves with thumbholes at the cuffs. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Off-the-shoulder top in soft jersey made from a viscose blend with narrow shoulder straps and short sleeves. Flounce at the top and smocking at the hem.
Bodysuit in soft, organic cotton jersey with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder, long sleeves and press-studs at the crotch.
Cotton jersey hipster briefs in various designs with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.

Spacious backpack with smart compartments and functions to give you space for both your laptop and your sports kit. Zip and roll-top closure at the top that can be folded down with the help of adjustable tabs and plastic fasteners. Detachable, zipped outer compartment, a handle at the top, padded, adjustable shoulder straps and a padded back plate. Padded laptop compartment, one larger zipped inner compartment, and two smaller inner compartments. Lined. Size 18x30x45 cm with the top rolled down and 18x30x55 cm at maximum capacity.
Straight-cut dress in woven fabric with an opening and visible buttons at the back and 3/4-length sleeves with flared cuffs. Unlined.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Sleeveless blouse in crinkled viscose with an opening and button at the back of the neck and frills at the sides. Lace-trimmed gathered seam at the top and an asymmetric hem.
Long-sleeved dress in textured jersey with a round neck, press-studs on one shoulder and fake welt front pockets.
Blouse in an airy weave with a V-neck, covered buttons down the front, short dolman sleeves and a tie detail at the hem.
Jumper in a soft knit containing glittery threads with long, slightly wider raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Scarf in a soft weave with fringes on the short sides.
Off-the-shoulder blouse in patterned chiffon crêpe with elastication at the top, long sleeves with elasticated cuffs, and a straight-cut hem.

Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband to hold in and shape the waist and wide, taped reinforcements down the legs for extra support. Concealed key pocket in the waistband.

Short, flared beach dress in an airy cotton weave with a deep V-neck, 3/4-length sleeves with hole embroidery and trumpet cuffs and gathered, hole-embroidered seams creating tiers for width and movement. Unlined.
Loose-fitting sports vest top in fast-drying jersey with a racer back.

Long, wide dress in an airy weave with a grandad collar, buttons at the top and long, wide raglan sleeves with narrow, covered elastication at the cuffs. Seam at the waist and a flared skirt with gathered tiers. Jersey inner dress.
Microfibre bralette with a lace back and mesh details. Underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, elasticated hem and no fasteners.
Straight-cut shirt jacket in washed, lightweight cotton twill with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Calf-length skirt in a pleated crêpe weave with a high waist, concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastening at one side, and a raw-edge hem.

Knee-length dress in soft, gently draping, patterned jersey with a deep V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the front and 3/4-length sleeves. Seam at the waist and a narrow, detachable tie belt with metal ends. Unlined.

Suede shoulder bag with a narrow, metal-chain shoulder strap and a flap with a metal fastener and short tab with a concealed magnetic fastener. One zipped inner compartment. Cotton twill lining. Size approx. 5x14x22 cm.
A-line dress in soft fabric with a press-stud on one shoulder and long sleeves.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Wide jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a wrapover, drawstring hood, low dropped shoulders and wide, 3/4-length sleeves. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem and short slits in the sides.
Shirt in softly draping matt silk with a collar and buttons down the front. Yoke with a pleat at the back, wide, buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Top in an airy, crinkled, pattern weave with a wide neckline and short, double-flounced sleeves.
Calf-length dress in a double-layered cotton weave with a crinkled texture. Round neck, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, and gathered seams at the hips and knees for added volume.
Fitted, rib-knit cardigan in a soft, fine viscose blend with a deep V-neck, buttons down the front and long sleeves.

Short parka in a cotton weave with a lined hood with a detachable faux fur trim. Zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front and flap front pockets with a pleat and press-stud. Drawstring at the waist and hem, a tab and press stud at the cuffs and a single back vent. Pile lining.

Padded parka in woven fabric with imitation leather details and a detachable, pile-lined hood with a detachable faux fur trim. High stand-up collar, a zip and wind flap with buttons down the front, flap front pockets with a button, handwarmer pockets with press-studs, a zipped pocket on one sleeve and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Lined.

Wide dress in airy chiffon crêpe with a frilled collar and V-neck with a drawstring at the top. Wide, raglan balloon sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, and a skirt with gathered tiers ending in a flounce at the hem. Lined.
Fully lined, print-patterned swimsuit with narrow shoulder straps and a frill at the front.
Playsuit in cotton jersey with butterfly sleeves, a round neckline and press-studs at the back. Side pockets and an elasticated seam at the waist with a decorative bow at the front.
Short dress in imitation leather with a collar, covered press-studs down the front, a chest pocket, short sleeves and a detachable tie belt. Lined.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a round neck, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem.

Short blouse in a crinkled, patterned weave with a deep neckline and an opening with ties at the back of the neck. Short puff sleeves with elastication at the hems, and a seam at the hem that is elasticated at the back.
Ankle boots with lacing at the front and fabric linings and insoles. Platform front 2.5 cm, heel 10 cm.

Set with a zip-through hoodie and pair of trousers in soft, organic cotton sweatshirt fabric. Hoodie with a jersey-lined hood, concealed zip down the front with a chin guard and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Trousers with an elasticated, drawstring waist and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Fitted, calf-length dress in jersey crêpe with a V-neck, narrow adjustable shoulder straps, a draped, sewn-in wrapover front and decorative ties at one side. Unlined.
Puffer gilet in a quilted weave with a stand-up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Welt side pockets and a rounded hem.

Jacket in a crisp cotton and nylon blend with a stand-up collar and zip and wind flap with concealed buttons down the front. Flap chest and front pockets with concealed buttons and an adjustable fastening at the cuffs. Unlined.
Leggings in ribbed organic cotton jersey with covered elastication at the waist and overlocked hems.
Leggings in soft, organic cotton jersey with covered elastication at the waist.
Top in soft jersey with short sleeves and a gentle flare to the hem.
Baby Exclusive. Leggings in soft cotton jersey with an adjustable, elasticated waist.
Knee-length dress in woven fabric with a mandarin collar, V-neck and buttons down the front. Long sleeves with rounded, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Unlined.
Top in lightweight cotton sweatshirt fabric with buttons at the top, long sleeves, an imitation leather appliqué at the hem and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
